pages.text: Souls must come from somewhere, yes? They must also go somewhere when their body perishes. Perhaps one could find a way to access this place? Maybe the powers within a Spatial Crystal are the key...

Unfortunately, it seems this place is completely unreachable. However, I have made a different discovery. Combining the high spatial energies of a Spatial Crystal with the binding powers of Soulforged Ingots, this key allows one to create and access a space within their own soul, a perfectly private place to put things.

Accessing this space is simple, simply hold right click with the key, and you will be sent in. Leaving is as easy as doing the same thing again, or right clicking on the core, which stabilizes the entire area and prevents it from collapsing. The space itself is rather small, you only have a 14x2x14 block space. Thankfully, the core can also help with that. By right clicking it while holding a Raw Soul, the amount of vertical space you have will be increased by 1 block.

Going outside this small area, known as soulspace, seems to be impossible. The walls are as hard as Bedrock, and even if you were to get outside, it would likely be extremely unpleasant. It is unknown what would happen, but it is theorized you would remember everything that has ever happened to your soul, including any past lives, all at once. Something like this would likely overwhelm your mortal self, rendering you instantly braindead.
